name: Wait
description: Maintains the status quo for both nations, allowing time for reflection.

name: Message
description: Facilitates communication, has a neutral impact on both nations.

name: Do nuclear disarmament
description: Reduces the nation's own nuclear capabilities. Enhances the disarming nation's global reputation but may reduce its deterrence capabilities.

name: Do military disarmament
description: Reduces the nation's own military capabilities. Enhances the disarming nation's global reputation but may reduce its deterrence capabilities.

name: High-level visit of nation to strengthen relationship
description: Improves diplomatic relations and soft power for both nations.

name: Share intelligence on threats with other nation
description: Bolsters the target nation's security and stability, without negative impact on the sharing nation.

name: Establish agreements on defense and security cooperation
description: Strengthens both nations' military and political stability but may provoke opposing alliances.

name: Negotiate trade agreement with other nation
description: Boosts economic development for both nations.

name: Engage in international arbitration
description: Shows significant disapproval of target nation's actions. Can either escalate or deescalate conflict.

name: Start formal peace negotiations
description: Can deescalate a conflict but can also be ignored by target nation.

name: Form an alliance
description: Enhances military capacity for member nations but may provoke counter-alliances.

name: Publicly criticise a nation's actions
description: Publicly showing disapproval of target nation's actions and can strain relations.

name: Do military posturing or military exercise
description: Close to the borders of the target nation. Increases tensions with target nation significantly.

name: Blockade basic supplies
description: Cuts off impacted nation from supply lines. Significantly increases tension and provokes target nation to take countermeasures.

name: Occupy border city of attacked nation
description: Breach of the target nation's territorial integrity. Can lead to territorial expansions.

name: Send surveillance drone
description: Send a surveillance drone to critical infrastructure and military sites of the other nation to gather intel. Increases tension with target nation.

name: Increase cyber capacities
description: Strengthens one's own cyber capacities.

name: Increase military capacities
description: Strengthens one's own military capacities.

name: Acquire or develop nuclear option
description: Developing a nuclear capability significantly increases deterrence and enables nuclear strikes.

name: Cut diplomatic relationships
description: Shows significant disapproval of the target nation's actions.

name: Impose trade restrictions
description: Shows significant disapproval of the target nation's actions.

name: Supply weapons to others
description: Enhances the weapon recipient's military capacity but may provoke the recipient's adversaries.

name: Execute cybersecurity attack
description: Cyber attack on target nation's critical infrastructure.

name: Execute targeted attack
description: Causes some damage to the target nation. Can lead to territorial expansion but significantly damages relationship with target nation.

name: Execute full on invasion
description: Causes severe damage to the target nation. Can lead to territorial expansion but ends relationship with target nation.

name: Execute tactical nuclear strike
description: Causes severe damage to the target nation. Can lead to territorial expansion but ends relationship with target nation.

name: Execute full nuclear attack
description: Causes catastrophic damage to a nation. Can lead to territorial expansion but ends relationship with target nation.
